tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_consent_forms (
    form_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name TEXT,
    date_signed DATE,
    consent_details TEXT,
    blockchain_hash TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_consents (
    consent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    consent_date DATE,
    consent_text TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    consent_id UUID NOT NULL,
    block_hash TEXT,
    block_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_consent_id FOREIGN KEY (consent_id) REFERENCES patient_consents(consent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_node INT,
    to_node INT,
    transaction_data JSON,
    FOREIGN KEY (from_node) REFERENCES blockchain_network(node_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (to_node) REFERENCES blockchain_network(node_id)
);

CREATE TABLE records (
   record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   patient_id UUID,
   network_id UUID,
   record_data TEXT,
   record_date TIMESTAMP
);
